A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Canto Bite is only 10min of screen time people. It's not the entire 2nd act as some nutto's make it out to be. Luke was Luke and as pessimistic as he always was. It's not awful. It isn't spectacular. It does some funny things and it does some overly serious things making it laughable. It's like the annoyance of the Furbies toys with a dash of the past films thrown in.
